per_frame_1=wave_x = wave_x + 0.150*(0.60*sin(2.121*time) + 0.40*cos(1.621*time));
per_frame_2=wave_y = wave_y - 0.150*(0.60*sin(1.742*time) + 0.40*sin(2.322*time));
per_frame_3=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*(0.40*sin(0.823*time) + 0.20*sin(0.916*time));
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g - 0.5*(0.40*sin(0.900*time) - 0.20*sin(1.023*time));
per_frame_5=wave_b = wave_b - 0.5*(0.40*sin(0.808*time) - 0.20*sin(0.949*time));
per_frame_6=decay = 0.98 + 0.002*sin(time);
per_frame_7=wave_r = wave_r+above(sin(0.2*time),0.33)*if (below(wave_r,0.5),0.5,wave_r);
per_frame_8=wave_g = wave_g + below(sin(0.2*time),0.33)*above(sin(0.2*time),-0.33)*if(below(wave_g,0.5),0.5,wave_g);
per_frame_9=wave_b = wave_b+below(sin(0.2*time),-0.33)*if(below(wave_b,0.5),0.5,wave_b);
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + 0.02*bass + 0.01*sin(1-0.2*rad);
per_pixel_2=rot = rot + 0.1*sin(4*sin(0.1*time)*rad*(1+3*sin(0.3*time)-rad));
per_pixel_3=dx = dx - 0.023*(0.22*rad)*sin(1.002*time);
per_pixel_4=dy = dy - 0.023*(0.22*rad)*cos(1.155*time);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_clouds;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{
warp_4=`    // sample previous frame
warp_5=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz-GetBlur1(uv);
warp_6=`ret+=tex2D(sampler_fw_clouds,uv)*0.5;
warp_7=`}
